name: The Aurelia Blog - Page 8
description: The official blog of the Aurelia project and Core Team.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Early July 2017
posts.description: The Aurelia Team continues to iterate and improve all aspects of the framework. Below you can find details on our recent minor release of aurelia-validation along with our patch releases of the aurelia-cli and aurelia-polyfills.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Mid June 2017
posts.description: This year, Aurelia's theme has been one of building out our ecosystem by enhancing plugins, tools, learning and community opportunity. Our releases today reflect that focus by showcasing improvements to several plugins (UX, Dialog and i18n) and launching a big update to our CLI.

posts.name: Introducing Aurelia Succinctly
posts.description: Interested in checking out a free book on Aurelia? Check out Aurelia Succinctly! It gives a great foundation for building your Aurelia applications.

posts.name: Aurelia at Build 2017
posts.description: If you are attending Build [http://build.microsoft.com] and are interested in seeing how to combine ASP.NET Core [https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/] and Aurelia [http://aurelia.io], you'll want to attend "Getting Started with Aurelia and ASP.NET Core" this Friday.

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - Late April 2017
posts.description: Our most recent set of Aurelia releases includes the Aurelia Dialog Release Candidate. We have a post dedicated to the details of that release, which you can read here [http://blog.aurelia.io/2017/04/27/aurelia-dialog-release-candidate/]. You'll also see that Aurelia UX is moving ahead steadily, with new components and capabilities being added every one to two weeks.

posts.name: Aurelia Dialog Release Candidate
posts.description: Thanks to the hard work of Aurelia Core Team members, Strahil Kazlachev and Patrick Walters, we're proud to announce the Aurelia Dialog v1 Release Candidate.

posts.name: Introducing Aurelia Weekly
posts.description: Today we're excited to launch our official weekly Aurelia newsletter. Each week we'll be featuring Aurelia announcements, events, articles, community surveys and important web industry news. If you haven't already signed up, you can get on the list here [http://eepurl.com/ces50j].
